text:
BOSTON UNIVERSITY
145 Bay State Road, Boston, Massachusetts 02215 Telephone 617/262-4300 - Ext. 2115
May 24, 1967
Vice President for University Affairs
Mr, Jerrold Sandler
Executive Director
National Educational Radio
1346 Connecticut Avenue N. W.
Washington, D. C.
Dear Jerry:
The enclosed is FYI. It was thoughtful of
Senator Kennedy, and may add at least one small
bright spot to your day.
Best wishes in your upcoming meetings.
Sincerely,
Russell R. Jalbert
RRJ:mbd
Enc.
cc. Will Lewis
